title: Error: ProcessError: "...BioPerl-1.007002/Build" no such file or directory
body:
bio-perl build fails
### Expected Result
it should build

### Actual Result
```console
==> Installing perl-bio-perl
==> Using cached archive: /home/devuser/Downloads/spack/var/spack/cache/perl-bio-perl/perl-bio-perl-1.007002.tar.gz
==> Staging archive: /home/devuser/Downloads/spack/var/spack/stage/perl-bio-perl-1.007002-mskps2k57r7bhlrkdau3or7ftpfgxl4q/BioPerl-1.007002.tar.gz
==> Created stage in /home/devuser/Downloads/spack/var/spack/stage/perl-bio-perl-1.007002-mskps2k57r7bhlrkdau3or7ftpfgxl4q
==> No patches needed for perl-bio-perl
==> Building perl-bio-perl [PerlPackage]
==> Executing phase: 'configure'
==> Executing phase: 'build'
==> Error: ProcessError: /home/devuser/Downloads/spack/var/spack/stage/perl-bio-perl-1.007002-mskps2k57r7bhlrkdau3or7ftpfgxl4q/BioPerl-1.007002/Build: No such file or directory
    Command: '/home/devuser/Downloads/spack/var/spack/stage/perl-bio-perl-1.007002-mskps2k57r7bhlrkdau3or7ftpfgxl4q/BioPerl-1.007002/Build'
See build log for details:
  /home/devuser/Downloads/spack/var/spack/stage/perl-bio-perl-1.007002-mskps2k57r7bhlrkdau3or7ftpfgxl4q/BioPerl-1.007002/spack-build.out`
```
See below for "spack-build.out" file
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install perl-bio-perl
```

### Information on your system
Linux Mint 18 

### spack-build.out
